item.title: Use Amazon EC2 to runlarge R computing jobs for cheap
item.description: Use Amazon EC2 to run large R computing on the cheap Wednesday, July 04, 2018 9:19 PM Spot instances on Amazon allows researchers to compute with very low cost. Here I will show you how to start an virtual machine on Amazon, establish connection via SSH, and set up the brand-new linux machine to run R using docker images.
